info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 4:26PM EDT until August 29 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ALLEN...SOUTHERN NOBLE AND CENTRAL WHITLEY COUNTIES... At 425 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Albion to near Tri-lakes to near Columbia City, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Kendallville, Columbia City, Tri-lakes, Avilla, Albion, Churubusco, Swan, Etna, Larwill, Lorane, Merriam, Blue Lake, Big Lake, Laotto, Arcola, Bear Lake, Lake Everett, Ege, Green Center and Dunfee. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across Kosciusko county. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
